鹲字的基本解释

鹲
（鸏）
méng
鸟类的一属，生活在热带海洋上，吃鱼类。
没有生毛的幼小水鸟。

鹲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méng］
［《廣韻》莫紅切，平東，明。］
［《廣韻》莫孔切，上董，明。］
“鹲1”的繁体字。
今鸟纲鸏科鸏属各种鸟的通称。体大，灰色或白色，嘴强直而侧扁，尾部有长羽毛。生活于热带海洋，又称热带鸟。吃鱼类。中国西沙群岛有红嘴鸏。

鹲字的康熙字典解释

鹲字的起名意思

鸟类的一属，生活在热带海洋上，吃鱼类。没有生毛的幼小水鸟。

Snipe
Basic explanation of words
Snipe
(鸏)
méng
A genus of birds that live in tropical oceans and eat fish.
Young waterfowl without hair.
Snipe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méng］
["Guangyun" Mo Hongqie, Pingdong, Ming. ]
["Guang Yun" Mo Kongqie, Shang Dong, Ming. ]
Traditional characters for "鹲1".
Nowadays, the general term for all kinds of birds in the genus Emu. It is large, gray or white, with a stiff mouth and flat sides, with long feathers on the tail. Living in the tropical ocean, also known as tropical bird. Eat fish. Red-billed moss is found in China's Paracel Islands.
